ygData.subject: Re: Tooting flutes (was: Re: Char Catillion)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was going to post that for a brief moment, Pixie Strike had been fixed - that Striking myself resulted in straight stuns or straight resists.  But then
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 10 Jan 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> I was getting solid resists, 0% success vs. a loathing lich.
> That is until I put my new flute on, which gave 100% success
> against the lich. Which was long enough for everyone to camp
> out (we had just been rez'd in and werent ready to fight) and
> then I pulled out my yk's and proceeded to lay the smack down
> until it triple 135'd me, heh good sacrific tho. Me and the
> other bard were the only ones to die for the cause.

I was going to post that for a brief moment, Pixie Strike had
been fixed - that Striking myself resulted in straight stuns
or straight resists. But then it went back to being "broken."
Now that you mention this, I think I had my flute equipped
when it seemed to work right (was running around invis). Will
have to test it more thoroughly tonight.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
